text: Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu-sha-tachi ni wa, kare-ra no tame ni, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ni tsuite no kippō o tsutae nasai. Kare-ra wa soko de, kate no kajitsu o atae rareru tabi ni,`kore wa watashi-tachi ga izen ni atae rareta monoda.' To iu. Kare-ra ni wa, sorehodo nitamono ga sadzuke rareru. Mata junketsuna haigūsha o sadzuke rare, eien ni sono naka ni sumu nodearu
